item.description:
DON 'T MISS THIS !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Cooking Class and Wine Pairing at Quattro's Italian Restaurant
Head Chef and owner, Luis Rojas, will demonstrate his extensive
culinary skills by preparing a 4 course meal. This exciting
menu will be accentuated by a wine pairing with each course.
Menu: Stuffed Shrimp, Gnocci with Vodka Cream Sauce, Tilapia
Florentine, Crepes.
$40.00 includes 4 course meal with wine pairing, recipes.
everyone. Would you be so kind to post the following on your
meetup-Wine and Dining Enthusiasts.
Cooking Class and Wine Pairing at Quattro's Italian Restaurant
Head Chef and owner, Luis Rojas, will demonstrate his extensive
culinary skills by preparing a 4 course meal. This exciting
menu will be accentuated by a wine pairing with each course.
Menu: Stuffed Shrimp, Gnocci with Vodka Cream Sauce, Tilapia
Florentine, Crepes.
$40.00 includes 4 course meal with wine pairing, recipes.
Quattro's Italian Restaurant, 14 Water Street, Guilford, RSVP
to Diane, di.onthego@yahoo.com or call 203-494-7585
, 14 Water Street, Guilford, RSVP
to Diane, di.onthego@yahoo.com or call 203-494-7585

item.name: Cooking Class and Wine Pairing at Quattro's Italian Restaurant "YUMMY"
